text: Ani jevha tyancyasamora amacya spasta ayati vacuna aikavilya jatata, tevha mhanatata ki ha asa manusya ahe, jo tumhala, tumacya vadavadilancya upasya daivatampasuna rokhu icchito (yakherija anakhi kahi nahi) ani ase mhanatata ki ha tara manane racalela aropa ahe, ani satya tyancyajavala ye'una pohocale tarihi inkara karanare heca mhanata rahile ki hi tara ughada jadu ahe
